Summary: Two lights chase each other in the sky and then disappear
divs: Sighting Details1 Star like light moves in a line across the sky. From Bernal Heights, it appears over Diamond Heights to the west. The light is bright enough to see with the naked eye. A 2nd light joins (chases?) the first and then the two lights move in a fast west and vertically high direction very quickly. The molecules in the sky appear suddenly very excited as if there were a cloud of energy, that was barely visable. The movement of the lights did not appear to be a GPS tracking satellite, as there was much changing of direction and the disappearing act as mentioned.
